chart.title: Active Radios by Groups
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Radio=radio_hwaddr | eval group_list=mvjoin(radio_groups,",") | stats latest(group_list) as Groups by Radio | stats count as Active by Groups

chart.title: Traffic Volume by Radio Groups
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Groups=mvjoin(radio_groups,",") | stats sum(down_gb) as Down sum(up_gb) as Up by Groups | eval GB=Up+Down | fields Groups,GB

chart.title: Traffic Volume by Radio
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Radio=radio_hwaddr | stats sum(down_gb) as Down sum(up_gb) as Up by Radio | eval GB=Up+Down | sort - GB | fields Radio,GB

search.query: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Radio=radio_hwaddr | stats latest(radio_freq) as freq latest(radio_addr) as "IP" latest(radio_software) as "Software" latest(radio_driver) as "Driver" sum(up_gb) as sum_up_gb sum(down_gb) as sum_down_gb sum(timeendpos) as seconds by Radio | eval total_gb=sum_up_gb+sum_down_gb | eval Down=round(sum_down_gb,2) . " GB" | eval Up=round(sum_up_gb,2) . " GB" | eval Duration=tostring(seconds, "duration") | eval Channel=freq . " MHz" | sort - total_gb | fields Radio,Channel,IP,Software,Driver,Up,Down,Duration

* sourcetype=anyfi_flow AND radio_hwaddr=$radio_hwaddr$ | stats values(service_uuid) as Service sum(up_mb) as sum_up_mb sum(down_mb) as sum_down_mb sum(timeendpos) as seconds avg(avg_signal_dbm) as avg_signal min(min_signal_dbm) as min_signal max(max_signal_dbm) as max_signal sum(down_pkts) as sum_down_pkts sum(up_pkts) as sum_up_pkts sum(down_lost_pkts) as sum_down_lost_pkts sum(up_lost_pkts) as sum_up_lost_pkts count(eval(state="tunnel_error")) as "Tunnel Errors" count(eval(state="auth_error")) as "Auth Errors" by service_uuid | eval Down=round(sum_down_mb,1) . " MB" | eval total_mb=sum_up_mb + sum_down_mb | eval Up=round(sum_up_mb,1) . " MB" | eval Duration=tostring(seconds, "duration") | eval Best=max_signal . " dBm" | eval Worst=min_signal . " dBm" | eval Average=round(avg_signal,1) . " dBm" | eval "Packet Loss"=round((sum_up_lost_pkts + sum_down_lost_pkts) / (sum_up_pkts + sum_down_pkts), 2) . "%" | sort - total_mb | fields Service, Up, Down, Duration, Best, Worst, Average, "Packet Loss", "Tunnel Errors", "Auth Errors"
